src_original: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ grāmagatam araṇyagatam vā adattam pareṣāṃ steyasaṃkhyātam ādadīta
tgt_original: 「若比丘，在聚落中，若閑靜處，不與物，懷盜心取；

src_original: yadrūpeṇādattādānena rājā vainaṃ gṛhītvā rājamātro vā hanyād vā badhnīyād vā pravāsayed  vā evaṃ cainaṃ vaded dhambho puruṣa cauro 'si bālo 'si mūḍho 'si steyo 'sīty (Upj(J)  23.1-5; ~ Skt.C 50 v5-7; vgl. Kṣudr-v(Bhī) 25 a2-4)
tgt_original: 隨不與取法，若為王、王大臣所捉，若殺、若縛、若驅出國： 『汝是賊！ 汝癡！

src_original: evaṃrūpaṃ bhikṣuḥ sthānam adhyāpadya sahādhyāpattyā abhikṣur bhavati yāvat tadyathā tālo mastakāc chinnaḥ yāvan nādhyāpatsye (Upj(J)  śṛṇu tvam āyuṣmann anekaparyāyeṇa bhagavatā prāṇātipāto vigarhitaḥ prāṇātipātaviratiḥ  stutā stomitā varṇitā praśastā adyāgreṇa te āyuṣmaṃ saṃcintya antataḥ kuntapipīliko  23.7-10; ~ Skt.C 51 r1-3; vgl. Kṣudr-v(Bhī) 25 a5-b1)  Uj III.ii.2.3.2
tgt_original: 汝無所知。 』比丘如是盜者，波羅夷，不共住。

src_original: yaḥ punar bhikṣur manuṣyaṃ vā manuṣyavigrahaṃ vā svahastaṃ saṃcintya jīvitād vyaparopayec  chastraṃ vainam ādhārayec chastrādhārakaṃ vāsya paryeṣeta maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpayen
tgt_original: 「若比丘，故自手斷人命，持刀授與人，歎譽死、快勸死：

src_original: maraṇāvarṇaṃ vāsyānusaṃvarṇayet* evaṃ cainaṃ vaded dhambho puruṣa kiṃ te 'nena pāpakenāśucinā
durjīvitena mṛtaṃ te bhoḥ puruṣa jīvitād varam iti cittānumataiś cittasaṃkalpair
anekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpayen maraṇāvarṇaṃ vāsyānusaṃvarṇayet* /
tgt_original: 』作如是心，思惟種種方便，歎譽死、快勸死。
